QuestData.Title: The Conqueror of Skorn!
QuestData.Description: You have done everything that we were sent here to do, $c. I must admit that you fight well. Your people are not as strange as I first thought.$B$BChieftain Ashtotem is certain to want to hear of your success, but if you decide to stay out here for whatever reason, I will continue to fight at your side.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Winterhoof Token to Chieftain Ashtotem at Camp Winterhoof.
QuestData.CompletionText: What news do you bring of Skorn, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: That is good news indeed! You have given us some breathing room to further our preparations for leaving.$B$BPlease, take one of these as a sign of our appreciation.
